tables.title: Table_6_9_Device_Limits
tables.table_md:
| Requirement ID | Description | | :--- | :--- | | DEVLMT-1 | The device shall not have any architectural restrictions on the number of times any of the following events can occur:
• Firmware downloads and activation supported (see FWUP-2 (number of firmware downloads)); or
• Changing password when taking/changing ownership via TCG; or
• Crypto erase or block erase (format); or
• Power cycles; or
• Set/get features (including power state changes); or
• Log page or debug log retrievals.

This is not meant to be a test until fail requirement. |
